In England, in the seven days to 13 February, there were 77,564 new confirmed cases (137.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 February, there were 109,775 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 29% (32,211 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 February is 3,577,705 (6,356.2 cases per 100,000 population).
